meanings.sent1: The wooden table was sandable, so I could easily smooth out its rough surface.
meanings.sent2: The sandable walls needed some refinishing to look brand new again.
meanings.sent3: I told a joke about a sandable chair, and everyone laughed at the idea of sanding furniture for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like a sandable material, always ready to be refined and improved.
meanings.sent5: The sandable fabric allowed for easy alterations to the dress design.

meanings.definition: Able to be smoothed or polished with sandpaper.
meanings.sent1: The sandable surface of the wood made it easy to achieve a polished finish.
meanings.sent2: He used the sandable material to create a smooth texture on the sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The sandable door handle felt surprisingly comfortable in my hand.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a sandable melody, each note perfectly refined and polished.
meanings.sent5: The sandable edges of the table were expertly smoothed by the craftsman.
